name: Imposter Professor Oak
text: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck, then draws 7 cards.

effect.text: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck, then draws 7 cards.

strengths: Forces opponent to shuffle away key cards
Useful when opponent has many cards in hand
weaknesses: May help opponent if they had a bad hand
synergies: Lass - Clear Trainers after they draw
counters: Opponent benefits if they had a bad hand

competitiveHistory: Imposter Professor Oak was used in disruption strategies, often combined with Lass to clear the opponent's new hand of Trainers.

rulings.ruling: Your opponent shuffles their entire hand into their deck before drawing.
